section_title: MARKET AND NON-MARKET MECHANISMS UNDER THE CONVENTION: Framework for Various Approaches
sentences: This item (FCCC/TP/2014/9) was first considered on Monday, 1 December.
SBSTA Chair Dlamini proposed, and parties agreed to, informal consultations facilitated by Peer Stiansen (Norway) and Mandy Rambharos (South Africa).
During the SBSTA closing plenary on Saturday, 6 December, SBSTA Chair Dlamini said no agreement had been reached on this issue and that the item would be added to the provisional agenda of SBSTA 42.
